product_name: ErborianCC Cream SPF 25 with Korean Centella Asiatica Extract
summary: SummaryErborian CC Cream is a Korean skincare product with a transforming texture, formulated with pigment technology for an enhanced sensorial experience to promote smoother application, even coverage, and a brighter skin-like finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically effective formula to IMMEDIATELY:Soothe skin (1)Blur skin texture (2)Even skin tone (3)Reduce appearance of visible skin imperfections (3)OVER TIME:Hydrate skin up to 24hrs (4)Even skin tone (5)Reduce appearance of visible skin imperfections (5)Provide more radiance and brightness to the skin (5)Improve skin texture (5)Research ResultsIMMEDIATE RESULTS:100% agree that skin tone looks more even (2)97% agree that the product is adjustable to my skin tone (2)97% agree that the complexion is more luminous (2)96% agree that the skin texture looks blurred (2)90% agree that the finish is so natural that it doesn‚Äôt look like they‚Äôre wearing makeup (2)Instant Self-esteem boost:94% agree that the product gives a ‚Äúmy skin but better‚Äù effect (2)AFTER 28 DAYS, ON BARE SKIN:+47% Visible skin tone evenness (5)+33% Skin texture improvement (5)+52% Skin luminosity (5)98% agree that their complexion looks more even and skin texture looks refined (6)96% agree that their skin is visibly smoother and re-plumped (6)96% agree that their skin is soothed and quality of skin is improved (6)Self-esteem boost:98% agree they felt confident with their skin (7)(1) Clair shade: Stinging test on 21 volunteers 30 seconds after application. Dor√©/Caramel shade: Stinging test on 22 volunteers 30 seconds after application.(2) Consumer test on 89 volunteers after application ; average score of all shades.(3) Clinical scoring on 89 volunteers immediately after application ; average score of all shades.(4) Efficacy test on 10 volunteers(5) Clinical scoring on 20 volunteers after 28 days ; average score of all shades.(6) Consumer test on 85 volunteers after 28 days ; average score of all shades.(7) Self-grading assessment by 85 volunteers after 28 days ; average score of all shades.Item 2548339How To UseApply all over the face and neck, massaging to release the encapsulated pigments.IngredientsActive: Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate/Octinoxate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate/Octisalate, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide. Inactive: Aqua/Water, Cyclomethicone, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Magnesium Sulfate, Vinyl Dimethicone /Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Centella Asiatica Extract, Mel/Honey Extract, Talc, Dimethicone/ Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trihydroxystearin, Butylene Glycol, Mica, Aluminum Hydroxide, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Polyester-1, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Methicone, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol, Eugenol, Limonene, CI 77492/Iron Oxides, CI 77491/Iron Oxides, CI 77499/Iron Oxides.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply all over the face and neck, massaging to release the encapsulated pigments.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments:
Lightest shade made my face orange. Terrible match.
I tried to lighten up some areas with concealer but it really didn't help.

reviews.headline: Don't Support Brands that aren't Inclusive
reviews.comments: Horrible shade range!! Do better.

reviews.headline: My Go to for years
reviews.comments:
The first time I used this I was confused because it was white. It will match your skin and blend beautifully. It is so lightweight and smoothing. Someone at work commented my skin looked like porcelain and I only had this on. 
Korea has the lock on skin care and makeup.

reviews.headline: 10/10 product
reviews.comments: The coverage this product provides is actually insane (in a good way). It feels great & you can put any makeup on top and it blends flawlessly. I use it as a foundation when I want good coverage & SPF. The shade range needs to be better though, please expand it!

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!! Worth the price
reviews.comments: The Eborian CC Cream is the best cc cream/makeup I have ever used! It's has a light coverage, and blended so well with my skin that it looks as though I have no face makeup on. I also hardly had to use any product, so it should last for awhile.

reviews.headline: The BEST skincare makeup.
reviews.comments: I've purchased this repeatedly, it's amazing.

reviews.headline: Nice coverage
reviews.comments: This evens out the skin pretty well. It has a strong smell, but it is pleasant, it kind of reminds me of soap. Still, not ideal for sensitive skin. Also, I probably won't purchase it again because of the chemical sunscreen ingredients.

reviews.headline: Very orange
reviews.comments: This product in shade Dor√© is very orange. I was gifted a sample of two shades. The product applies nicely and does not have an offensive smell. Unfortunately it's extremely orange.

reviews.headline: Very orange
reviews.comments: This product in shade Dor√© is very orange. I was gifted a sample of two shades. The product applies nicely and does not have an offensive smell. Unfortunately it's extremely orange.

reviews.headline: Not as buildable as hoped
reviews.comments: Nice texture. Does not leave ashiness on the face. Not very buildable

reviews.headline: Best ISH ever!
reviews.comments: I have purchased several tubes and will not stop purchasing. I no longer wear foundation. The best way I can describe how this looks is basically enhanced skin. Its amazing for hot summer days and does not make you shiny. If you are thinking about purchasing, do it! You will love it!

reviews.headline: Not great for lighter skin tones
reviews.comments: The lightest shade was too dark and orange on me, otherwise the formula was good.

reviews.headline: Not great for lighter skin tones
reviews.comments: The lightest shade was too dark and orange on me, otherwise the formula was good.

reviews.headline: Best tinted sunscreen
reviews.comments: Super smooth and soft !!! Full coverage ! Absolutely in love !!!!

reviews.headline: Not great for fair/cool skin
reviews.comments: I have very fair skin with a cool undertone. This looks very dark/orange on me immediately after applying. Universal tinted products are generally too dark for my skin, but I can usually use the lighest shade when there are 3-5 options. That was not the case with this CC cream. Tried both the CC cream and the CC water. The CC cream is a definite no, but the CC water blends into my skin better. However, the CC water is still a bit too warm for me (just not as noticeable as the CC cream).

reviews.headline: Dore is like an orange color
reviews.comments: I purchased the Dore color based on my skin but it looks orange will be returning product.

reviews.headline: Magic
reviews.comments: Highly recommend. Perfect coverage. I have combination skin and this worked perfectly for me.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I bought the darker color since it seemed to match my skin tone. It was way too orange. It looked awful. The coverage was good and it blended nicely. But the color was not it. I returned it and bought the loghter color but it doesnt cover the same and it was too light. They need more color options

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: I have sensitive acne prone skin and this product left my skin feeling dry after a bit and made me breakout. Its ok just not something i would rebuy. Mixing moisturizater and a drop of foundation has the same if not better affect.

reviews.headline: So Good for Aged Skin!
reviews.comments: I love this cream! We no longer have the other big-name beauty store in my city, and i was getting Dr. Jart. I tried this because now I'm an Ulta girl, and its even better! For aged skin like mine, it's nice to bace coverage without a cakey look or something that sinks into creases. This does not! It also just helps my skin feel better!

media.headline: Clair works for light-medium warm toned skin
media.caption: I'm wearing the CC cream on the right half of my face. It noticeably evens out my skin, and it also tones down the greasiness of my sunscreen underneath!

media.headline: I am addicted and finally found the perfect product!
media.caption: CC Cr√®me

faceoff_positive.comments: This was so great to have all summer while my skin was slightly sun kissed. This product evened out my skin tone and gave it the moisture and sun screen I needed all day long. I didn't have to wear foundation all summer! Highly recommend!!
faceoff_positive.headline: CC cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
So I finally tried a free sample I had gotten for this and at first I was surprised by the amount of color it had but quickly noticed it didn't match my skin. I wish they would clarify your skin tone before sending samples because I could have totally felt differently if it matched my skin better, but unfortunately you could easily see when I had rubbed it off of my nose or my chin. It also built up extra dark color around the edges of my face. I just blended it in but I've never had this issue before with other CC creams. Maybe a bit too much color. I could do with less coverage.

Also, I felt like I looked spotty. It wasn't quite a smooth one color look. It was textured visually, but it didn't flake really except for with my blush but I think I was blending too much lol.
Now I did like the feel and smell of it. Idk why some people had an issue with the smell it's nothing crazy for a cream to smell like cream. ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüòÖ

Anyway, for the price, I'd definitely buy something better. This would be a decent budget option, but my review is based mostly on the price. It also has almost nothing beneficial in it except the centella asciatica. But Koreans love their one ingredient skin care. I however, prefer a powerhouse. Tyvm.
faceoff_negative.headline: Okay I suppose

rollup.name: CC Cream SPF 25 with Korean Centella Asiatica Extract
